title: Hone no aru Yatsu - Novel Updates
tags: Amnesia   Awkward Protagonist   Calm Protagonist   Friendship   Honest Protagonist   Humanoid Protagonist   Lack of Common Sense   Magic   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Mob Protagonist   Naive Protagonist   Nobles   Soldiers
author: Kamiya Ren   神谷錬
description:
I’m fully skeletal, really, thank you very much.
I have no skin, muscles or internal organs.
Thanks to that, I don’t know if I’m a man or woman.
Of course, because I’m just bones, I don’t have any ability.
I’m muscleless and powerless.>
